#include <RoboticPlatformWindow.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for RoboticPlatformWindow:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for all Robotic Platform windows.

All windows of the Robotic Platform GUI (e.g., control panels, the scene viewer GUI) are derived from the class RoboticPlatformWindow. This classes stores a list of all windows that can be retrieved for various purposes.
